english.segment1: Wait up, don't you close your eyes. Breathe life little flower. You've got 20 T-cells left to burn. Please choose life with its sweet and sour
english.segment2: Don't sing your last lullaby. I don't think it is time
english.segment3: We're all going to die. But we're all not meant to die young. We're all going to die. But we're all not meant to die young
english.segment4: Wait up, don't you close your eyes. Love has been hidden in the shadow. You've got the rope already tied around your neck. One voice whispers life through your sorrow
english.segment5: Don't sing your last lullaby. I don't think it is time
english.segment6: We're all going to die. But we're all not meant to die young. We're all going to die. But we're all not meant to die young
english.segment7: This is not your lullaby. Don't go to sleep. Not yet
english.segment8: We're all going to die. But we're all not meant to die young. Wait for the sunrise. Cause we're all not meant to die young
